scripts.local-nodocker: set DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./local.env&&node -r dotenv/config MicroservicesAPIGateway/server.js >> combined.log 2> error.log
scripts.docker-local-dev-build: cross-env TARGETENV=dev docker compose --env-file docker/environments/local.env  -p gateway-dev -f docker/docker-compose.local.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.override.yml  build --no-cache
scripts.docker-local-dev-up: cross-env TARGETENV=dev docker compose --env-file docker/environments/local.env -p gateway-dev -f docker/docker-compose.local.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.override.yml up -d --remove-orphans --no-build
scripts.docker-local-prod-up: cross-env TARGETENV=prod docker compose --env-file docker/environments/local.env -p gateway-prod -f docker/docker-compose.local.yml -f docker/docker-compose.prod.override.yml up -d --remove-orphans --no-build
